EmailTemplate.name: 2016Q3.Global.NUR.1739.Airscale.Email 5 - BTS Executive Summary & Brochure
EmailTemplate.subject: Start today to prepare for 5G and IoT
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The base station with unlimited capacity ready for 5G and IoT AirScale Radio Access Are your base stations ready for 45 times more traffic? Read the Brochure <[[http://networks.nokia.com/file/49336/nokia-airscale-bts-brochure?download]]> Global mobile traffic could be 45 times higher in 2020 than in 2014. 79 percent of that demand will come from data-hungry video and audio streaming.*
Each Nokia AirScale Base Station <[[http://networks.nokia.com/portfolio/products/airscale-radio-access/airscale-base-station]]> has ten times the capacity of other base stations. Need more capacity? Simply chain base station modules or add an unlimited supply of capacity from the cloud.
*Source: Bell Labs Consulting report: “Who will satisfy the desire to consume?” No matter what the future demands, you can be 5G-ready. Read the Executive Summary <[[http://networks.nokia.com/file/52196/executive-summary-nokia-airscale-base-station?download]]> © 2016 Nokia.
